text: Nightflight to Venus is the third studio album by Euro-Caribbean group Boney M.. It was released in June 1978. The album became a major success in continental Europe, Scandinavia, and Canada. It topped most of the album charts during the second half of 1978. It became the group's first number one album in the United Kingdom. Category:1978 albums Category:Boney M.
title: Nightflight to Venus
